summary: TAKATA RECALL  I CALLED MY LOCAL DEALERSHIP TODAY LITIA DODGE AND WAS TOLD THAT THE PARTS ARE NOT AVALIBLE YET FOR THIS RECALL. REALLY? LIKE THE RECALL IS ALMOST A YEAR OLD AND WE ARE STILL WAITING ON PARTS? WHAT IS THE DEAL? I  JUST RECENTLY BOUGHT THIS PICKUP SO WHEN I TOLD THE SERVICE GUY THIS HE SAID THAT THEY WOULD NOTIFY ME. I AGAIN TOLD HIM THAT I JUST GOT THIS PICKUP SO HOW IS DODGE GOING TO NOTIFY ME? SO I JUST FIGURED THAT MAYBE IF I GO ON THIS SITE I CAN GET SOME ANSWERS AND NOTIFICATIONS BECAUSE IT WAS OBVIOUS MY LOCAL DEALERSHIP DIDN'T GIVE A RIP.
